name: Starcat vs The Froggos Empire
description:
LONG TIME AGO,
IN A GALAXY FAR FAR AWAY
THE FROGGOS STRIKED BACK.
AFTER DESTROYING PLANET EARTH,
THE REBEL CATS WHO SURVIVED
ARE PLANNING TO REVENGE THE FALLEN ONES.

Loot, craft and build your own Spaceship in this highly customizable and galactic shoot'em-up.

Credits:

Programming, Art, & Game Design: @ricenoodles
Programming, Audio, & Game Design: @adoankim

Software:

-Construct 3, Aseprite, Bosca Ceoil & SFXR.
-Guest Musician: NOVA ERA
